title: Across the Rhine (1995) - WIN-ALL
description:
The war is on, and you're planted right in the eye of the hurricane. A revolutionary first-person combat title, 1944: Across the Rhine was among the first games to merge tactical planning with visceral combat elements. You'll have dozens of troops to position however you see fit assigning different tactical maneuvers to each unit. The combat goes down in full 3D detail, allowing you to carry out each of the assignments you've put forth. Multiplayer action is available via the Internet or a Local Network.


1.Extract anywhere.
2.Press "START THE GAME" batch file.
3.Play.

Compatible with WIN-ALL
